Keywords: Avengers , Fantastic Four , Ruler , Wakanda , Warrior
Real Name: T'Challa
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Hindering
TO FIGHT FOR EQUALITY IN RUDYARDA: The maximum attack, defense, and damage values of opposing characters within 6 squares and line of fire are each equal to Black Leopard's printed value of that type.
REMINDERS OF HOW THEY VIEW EVEN A KING: Leadership, Perplex. When Black Leopard uses Perplex to target himself, modify the chosen value by +2 instead if an opposing character within 6 squares and line of fire has a higher printed value for the chosen value than Black Leopard's printed value.

Comments
November 29, 2021
Redrover454
I just wanna give props to whoever designed this dial. What a creative and effective trait. He's surely a pain to go up against, but he's not broken, and he can be dealt with. Pair him with some other CR/ESD people or some high defense Defend to make the most out of his trait. He loves hindering terrain too.
February 19, 2021
Goop
FF has a bunch of traits that allow you to bring in different F4 members, this is a guy you definitely want on your sideline to come in against all those annoying team that go perplex crazy or have a ton of modifiers. He does lack stealth and can be sniped from far away with only CR to protect him. You will likely have to use his super perplex on his own def. Still very good all around though.
October 8, 2020
thekornknownasme
He really helps out the Wonder Twins

Or Nightbringer for Stealth.[/QUOTE] If you play him in a Wakanda theme team you can play him with the OP Kit Storm which gives stealth to friendly characters close to her.
